channel.title: I need someone to host bmxscape!
channel.description: hi ive been trying to get no-ip and hamachi to work 4 ever and i cant get them to work so i need someone to host bmxscape for me. i will make you co-owner and stuff i just need someone to host it for me!

item.title: I need someone to host bmxscape!
item.dc:creator: @nov9862 nov9862
item.description:
@nov9862 wrote:

I can host it for you. i host my own servers before. quite easy for me.
PLus Bmx, are you the real bmx, if so do you remember me?

Read full topic
item.source: I need someone to host bmxscape!

item.title: I need someone to host bmxscape!
item.dc:creator: @SeySayux SeySayux
item.description:
@SeySayux wrote:

lol.

  1. if you don’t have a router, you have luck… maybe you should check if your modem and router aren’t the same device, you can see this when you have a default gateway set
  2. in case your modem and router are the same device (like mine), forward the ports
  3. duh! set up your no-ip account!
  4. definitially you need to do this
  5. every windows Xp and windows vista has built-in firewalls

Read full topic
item.source: I need someone to host bmxscape!

item.title: I need someone to host bmxscape!
item.dc:creator: @bmxscape bmxscape
item.source: I need someone to host bmxscape!

item.title: I need someone to host bmxscape!
item.dc:creator: @SeySayux SeySayux
item.description:
@SeySayux wrote:

  1. do you have a router?
  2. do you have port forwarded it propely?
  3. do you have a no-ip account, set up good?
  4. have you pinged all ip levels? (127.0.0.1, , , )
  5. do you have a firewall? in case yes, try to disable it and do step 4 again

Read full topic

item.title: I need someone to host bmxscape!
item.dc:creator: @SeySayux SeySayux
item.description:
@SeySayux wrote:

  1. until i registered here, i didn’t knew what hamachi was, and to be honest, i still dont know
  2. no loopback means anyone can connect to my server via no-ip, except me, so i always have to connect via 127.0.0.1. because of that, i thought my server was unreachable, until one of my friends told me they were on my server.

Read full topic
item.source: I need someone to host bmxscape!

item.title: I need someone to host bmxscape!
item.dc:creator: @XmoparscapeX XmoparscapeX
item.description:
@XmoparscapeX wrote:

hey bmx i thought your server used to be no-ip cose it was awsome, i would host for you but its just like my hosting oni works for one source and thats fr33z3sc4p3 and its port 5555 and when i change port to 43594 it dont work so sorry m8 i would of done it but soz[br][size=1]Posted on: March 31, 2007, 03:19:51 AM[/size][hr][quote=“SeySayux, post:2, topic:72581”]can you tell me the problem? maybe i can help you, i’ve a lot of experience in port forwarding, no-ip, and that stuff… maybe you don’t need anyone to host it, and you can host it yourself. I also did a whole year trying to get my server up, when i discovered that my modem has no loopback…[/quote] must of been hard on you one year did you use hamachi insted
